ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Pet focus item quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I may have found the problem.  I went back to Vira, this time for the Shovel. Because of what happened with the Broom I was extra careful to pay close
ygData.messageBody:
I may have found the problem. I went back to Vira, this time for the Shovel.
Because of what happened with the Broom I was extra careful to pay close
attention to everything. I found that she asked for a ruby as one of the
items for the shovel. I brought a fire emerald! I did so because that is
what was listed on the eqspoilers site as required. (To keep up with what I
needed I had the site up and the list visible on a second computer.) I wasn't
paying close enough attention the first time, relying on the site to be
correct.

Once I discovered this I asked her about the broom again. She asked for a STAR
ruby, not just a ruby as listed on eqspoilers! I believe this is why I failed
with the broom. I gave her a ruby, not a star ruby.

Also, I am not going to give her this fire emerald for the shovel. I am going
to go buy a ruby like she says, but unlike what I found on the website.



On Wednesday 25 December 2002 10:17, Jack Whaley wrote:
> One other thing I just thought about. I did not fight for the Griffon
> Feather. I bought it from a vendor, as well as the Ruby. I feel confident
> it is okay to use a bought Ruby, but not so confident about the Griffon
> Feather. Any thoughts?
>
> On Monday 23 December 2002 09:20, Rob LeBeau wrote:
> > I heard that maybe one of these DOES matter the order
> > in which she is given things.
> >
> > I will check a couple of resources to see if that is
> > true and if there is any mention of the order.
> >
> > It will help me too since I have a 32 level Human
> > mage.
> >
> > Will let you know
> >
> > Rob
> >
> > --- Jack Whaley <jdwhaley@...> wrote:
> > > I have a mage that is doing the pet focus item
> > > quests that are given by Vira
> >
> > > in Solusek's Eye, and I have already turned in the
> >
> > > required items and
> >
> > > received my Stein of Ulissa. However, when I tried
> >
> > > to turn in the items for
> >
> > > my Broom of Trillion, Vira told me that Solusek Ro
> >
> > > did not accept half
> >
> > > measures, kept my items, and did not give me the
> >
> > > focus item.
> >
> > > She evidently felt that I had somehow failed to
> >
> > > properly fulfill the quest,
> >
> > > yet I am certain I gave her all the correct items.
> >
> > > When offering her an item,
> >
> > > the 4-slot trade-box opens with that item in the
> >
> > > first slot. Does it matter
> >
> > > what order the items are placed in the slots?
> > >
> > > The other thing I wonder about is that after I
> >
> > > turned in my items and received
> >
> > > the stein, I talked to her about all of the other
> >
> > > focus quests. I do not
> >
> > > remember what order we discussed them, but could she
> >
> > > only be remembering the
> >
> > > last one we discussed and it was not for the broom?
> > >
> > > Canostrol
> >
> > > 32 Gnome Mage
> > > Bristlebane
> >
> > i
